config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The DEFAULT_ESCAPE configuration is used to retrieve the default escape character for search string in the code. It is accessed through the session's database settings.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The DEFAULT_ESCAPE configuration is triggered whenever a search string escape character is needed in the code. The frequency of triggering depends on the usage of search string escape characters in the system.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the DEFAULT_ESCAPE configuration option on the system is minimal, as it mainly affects the search functionality by providing an escape character for search strings.
